title: Web Design and Development
description: Made blog pages using Divi theme, including theme builder and theme options, and added plugins for managing the posts on Wordpress
Made grand chart for the project and supported the team for making meeting slides, scheduling, organizing tasks on Basecamp and fixing some errors on the website
Updated the branding guide with the new color palette and designed tablet version for the website based on the desktop version done before
Added and fixed some features as client required
Worked directly with the client to get their demands and expectations as well as give them some recommendations and training to work to the post templates
